COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
William BOYD, Petitioner Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
William Ricky Boyd, Petitioner No. 69 WAL 2018
No. 70 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 23, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 23rd day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
